readUtf8

public static String readUtf8(DataInput in)
                       throws IOException
Safely reads a string as UTF-8 from a byte stream.

Unlike DataInput.readUTF(), this implementation does not limit the string size.

Parameters:
in - The stream
Returns:
The string
Throws:
IOException
See Also:
writeUtf8(DataOutput, String), decodeUtf8(byte[])

writeUtf8

public static void writeUtf8(DataOutput out,
                             String string)
                      throws IOException
Safely writes a string in UTF-8 to a byte stream. This method does not differentiate between empty strings and nulls.

Unlike DataOutput.writeUTF(String), this implementation does not limit the string size.

Parameters:
out - The stream
string - The string or null
Throws:
IOException
See Also:
readUtf8(DataInput), encodeUtf8(String)
